member.name: Windows.MFCreateEncryptedMediaExtensionsStoreActivate
member.summary: This function creates an object that implements . This object’s implementation of ActivateObject is based on the specified IMFPMPHostApp and class ID.
member.param: An with the necessary information to create the IMFActivate for this app package.
An representing the object stream that will be loaded via IMFActivate.Load.
An LPCWSTR representing the target object's activatable class id.
Receives a reference to the to an IMFActivate.
